multifactorialAllGenesWeak

public void multifactorialAllGenesWeak(int numPerturbations)
The basal transcription rate alpha_0 of all genes is sampled from a normal distribution with mean alpha_0 and standard deviation CV_.

multifactorialStrong

public void multifactorialStrong(int numPerturbations)
A perturbation is applied to a gene with probability perturbationProbability_. The basal activations alpha_0 are sampled from a uniform distribution in [0 1] independently of their unperturbed value.
